Class FilterSelectsListsLoader

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Business logic class for loading/reloading the dropdowns of filter selects

      • loadFilterSelects

        public static FilterUpperTO loadFilterSelects(FilterUpperTO filterUpperTO,
                              TPersonBean personBean,
                              java.util.Locale locale,
                              boolean firstLoad,
                              boolean withParameter)
        Adds the possible values, matchers etc. Depending on firstLoad preselects some values Extra care should be taken for selecting the projects when firstLoad=false because the other lists should be populated depending on the selected project The other selected fields might be invalid after a new loading because the project list might change (for ex. by revoking the read right for a project), consequently the selected project(s) might change and therefore the content of the lists also. It means that some selections may have invalid values (values not present in the list) but that is not a problem because after the first submit we will have valid selections again
        Parameters:
        filterUpperTO -
        personBean -
        locale -
        firstLoad - first load during this session, false: any further loads
        withParameter -
        exclusiveProjectID - set only by creating a project specific filter
        Returns:

      • reloadProjectDependentSelects

                                          java.lang.Integer[] selectedProjects,
                                          java.lang.Integer[] selectedItemTypes,
                                          TPersonBean personBean,
                                          java.util.Locale locale,
                                          boolean withParameter,
                                          boolean showClosedReleases)
        Adds the possible values, matchers etc. Depending on firstLoad preselects some values Extra care should be taken for selecting the projects when firstLoad=false because the other lists should be populated depending on the selected project The other selected fields might be invalid after a new loading because the project list might change (for ex. by revoking the read right for a project), consequently the selected project(s) might change and therefore the content of the lists also. It means that some selections may have invalid values (values not present in the list) but that is not a problem because after the first submit we will have valid selections again
        Parameters:
